Episodes.Title: Welcome, Cousin Riff: Special Skills
Episodes.Plot: BJ and Baby Bop's cousin Riff moves to town; Riff showcases his musical talent during a show BJ and Baby Bop put on.

Episodes.Title: Airplanes; Boats
Episodes.Plot: Riff takes BJ's new toy airplane apart; Baby Bop wants to ride in a big boat.

Episodes.Title: Butterflies; Bugs
Episodes.Plot: Baby Bop loses her pet caterpillar; the park transforms into an amphitheater with performing insects.

Episodes.Title: Shapes; Colors
Episodes.Plot: Riff loses his lucky medal and fears he will not be able to play games at the Shapes Carnival; Baby Bop sees a beautiful rainbow.

Episodes.Title: Seeing; Hearing
Episodes.Plot: Baby Bop says she saw an elephant during hide-and-seek; BJ and Riff compete to find or make the loudest sound in the park.
